name: Skeletal Champion
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skeleton makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Shielding Riposte
reactions.desc: When a creature within the skeletons reach misses with a melee attack against the skeleton or a creature within 5 feet, the skeleton makes a longsword attack against the attacker. The skeleton must be wielding a longsword to use this reaction.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: A skeleton doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.
